DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of vaccination with autologous myeloma cells and an allogeneic granulocyte-macrophage colony stimulating factor (GM-CSF) producing cell line.
DOC.brief_title: Vaccination in the Peripheral Stem Cell Transplant Setting for Multiple Myeloma
DOC.criteria: De novo multiple myeloma ECOG 02 No serious comorbid illnesses and adequate organ function > 4 weeks from systemic steroids No existing secondary malignancies and no history of secondary malignancies in the past 5 years No active autoimmune disease
